thread.title: Penn State cancels classes for Tuesday, March 14
thread.title_full: Penn State cancels classes for Tuesday, March 14

author: Andrew Kalmowitz | The Daily Collegian
title: Penn State cancels classes for Tuesday, March 14
text:
Buy Now Samantha Myers 
Kalli Seiber(junior-kinesiology), Katie Morrison(senior-public relations), Elizabeth Tieu(junior-kinesiology), and Tara Rogers(junior-kinesiology) pose for pictures and selfies in front of Old Main on Thursday, Feb. 9, 2016. 
Classes at University Park are canceled for Tuesday, March 14, according to a PSU Alert. 
All activites will be canceled on campus until 10 p.m. Tuesday due to the impending snow storm set to hit Penn State at about 11 p.m. on Monday night. 
This is Penn State University Park's first snow day since the Spring semester of 2015. 
Ten to 16 inches of snow are predicted to fall on campus between 11 p.m. Monday and 10 p.m. Tuesday, according to the national weather service. Tags
